origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'MarketResearchAPI.fetch_reports', 'description': 'This function retrieves market reports for a specified industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry for which reports are requested, e.g., healthcare, technology.'}, {'name': 'reportCount', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of reports to fetch.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'reports', 'description': 'A list of market reports for the specified industry.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 MarketResearchAPI.fetch_reports, 它的参数输入如下: 'industry'是'healthcare', 'reportCount'是'3'.
